<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Collapse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3533) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 56

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Trigger**
An enemy's Strike against you is a critical hit.

</column>

---

You collapse into a pile of bones, mitigating the worst of the damage you would have taken, and the triggering attack deals only the amount it would deal on a hit (typically full damage instead of double damage). Any other effects caused by a critical hit still occur. While collapsed, you're [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) and can't act except to Stand, which re-forms you into a skeleton in a standing position.
name: Collapse
